p: We report simple δ-Ct values for each run, with raw Ct of the target gene of interest (IFN-α or IFN-β) subtracted from raw Ct of the β-Actin housekeeping gene in Figure 1—figure supplement 6. Calculation of fold change upon viral infection in comparison to mock using the δ-δ-Ct method ( Livak and Schmittgen, 2001) was inappropriate in this case, as we wished to demonstrate constitutive expression of IFN-α in PaKiT01 cells, whereby data from mock cells was identical to that produced from infected cells.
